insert into eb_live_room (id, roomid, name, cover_img, start_time, end_time, anchor_name, anchor_img, share_img, live_status, create_time, update_time, goods) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roomid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{anchorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anchorImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goods,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update eb_live_room set roomid = #{roomid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_img = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, anchor_name = #{anchorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, anchor_img = #{anchorImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_img = #{shareImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, live_status = #{liveStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods = #{goods,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, roomid, name, cover_img, start_time, end_time, anchor_name, anchor_img, share_img, live_status, create_time, update_time, goods from eb_live_room where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
